racing.label: Racing
racing.longDescription: A competitive racing platform where you can join, host, and track races with detailed statistics and leaderboards.
racing.author: DEVHUB

reviews.comment: Amazing racing platform! Great graphics and smooth gameplay.
Best racing app I've used. Love the competitive features and leaderboards.

PushNotification.message: New update available! Check out the latest features in the Racing app.

devhub_truckRobbery.name: Truck Robbery
devhub_truckRobbery.smallDescription: Intercept and rob heavily guarded armored trucks.
devhub_truckRobbery.description: Join the queue and wait for your turn. Track the truck, hack its systems, set up a jammer at the destination, eliminate guards, and crack open the secured cargo.

uid_1.name: Join the queue
uid_1.description: Join the queue and wait for your turn.

uid_2.name: Receive GPS location
uid_2.description: You will receive a GPS marker showing where the truck will start its route.

uid_3.name: Hack the truck
uid_3.description: Drive close to the truck and start hacking. Not too close or they will detect you!

uid_4.name: Get final destination
uid_4.description: After successfully hacking the truck, you will receive the final destination coordinates.

uid_5.name: Activate the jammer
uid_5.description: Go to the destination and activate the jammer using your tablet.

uid_6.name: Wait for the truck
uid_6.description: Wait for the truck to arrive at the final destination.

uid_7.name: Eliminate the guards
uid_7.description: Take down the guards protecting the truck.

uid_8.name: Open the rear doors
uid_8.description: Open the back doors of the truck. You may need special items (Bomb, Blue Pendrive, or Red Pendrive).

devhub_airDrops.name: Air drops
devhub_airDrops.smallDescription: Receive random air drops at specified locations.
devhub_airDrops.description: Join the queue and wait for your turn. You will receive a notification and the air drop location on the map. Go to the location and collect the air drop.

uid_1.name: Join the queue
uid_1.description: Join the queue and wait for your turn.

uid_2.name: Receive GPS location
uid_2.description: You will receive a GPS marker showing the area where the air drop will land.

uid_3.name: Wait for the drop
uid_3.description: Wait for the air drop to fall from the sky to the designated area.

uid_4.name: Deal with guards
uid_4.description: Depending on the drop type, guards may spawn that you need to eliminate, or none at all.

uid_5.name: Open the air drop
uid_5.description: Open the air drop crate. Some may require a special item to unlock.

uid_6.name: Escape!
uid_6.description: Take your loot and get out of there before the police arrive.

devhub_houseRobbery.name: House Robbery
devhub_houseRobbery.description: Steal valuable items from a location. The more you steal, the higher the chance the police will arrive.

uid_1.name: Join the queue
uid_1.description: Join the queue and wait for your turn.

uid_2.name: Receive location
uid_2.description: You will receive a notification and the apartment location on the map.

uid_3.name: Pick the lock
uid_3.description: Use a lockpick on the door and enter the apartment.

uid_4.name: Loot the apartment
uid_4.description: Take everything you can. Be careful: the more you steal, the higher the chance the police will arrive.

uid_6.name: Sell at pawn shop
uid_6.description: Sell all stolen items at the pawn shop.
